name: DryMerge
headline: Automate work with plain English.
description:
DryMerge lets people automate work with plain English. Say you want to manage inbound leads. Instead of dragging blocks or writing code, just tell DryMerge "Whenever I get an email from a potential customer, add their details to a google sheet and draft a reachout message" and watch it happen in seconds.

Counterintuitively, 88% of no-code users are actually programmers. We're changing that by making automation as fast and intuitive as conversation. This opens up the market to all knowledge workers, not just technical ones, and expands it by an order of magnitude.

founders.name: Edward Frazer, Founder
founders.description: Making DryMerge (W24) to automate work with words. Previously @ Stripe & Meta; studied at Yale.

founders.name: Samuel Brashears, Founder
founders.description: CTO DryMerge, formerly Cerebras Systems and Hive AI.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: DryMerge**

**Website:** [DryMerge](https://www.drymerge.com)
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Not specified  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Backed by:** Y Combinator (Batch W24)  
**Group Partner:** Jared Friedman

**Mission:**  
DryMerge's mission is simple but powerful: to automate work using plain English. Instead of wrestling with complex code or painstakingly dragging blocks to create automation workflows, users can articulate their needs as if having a conversation. For instance, a user could say, "Whenever I get an email from a potential customer, add their details to a Google Sheet and draft a reachout message." The magic happens in seconds.

**Why DryMerge Stands Out:**  
Counterintuitively, a significant majority—88%—of no-code users are programmers, which highlights a gap in accessibility. DryMerge aims to democratize automation for all knowledge workers, making it as fast and intuitive as talking. This not only broadens the market but positions DryMerge as a game-changer in the no-code landscape.

**Key Features:**
1. **Plain Language Automation:** Users can simply describe what they want automated, without any coding.
2. **AI-Powered Integrations:** DryMerge connects seamlessly with various business applications, automating repetitive tasks.
3. **Customization:** Users can create tailored workflows that suit their unique business needs.
4. **Quick Setup:** Automations are set up swiftly, allowing users to focus on higher-level tasks.

**How It Works:**
1. **Describe Your Automation:** Users articulate their automation needs in everyday language.
2. **Connect Your Apps:** DryMerge identifies and guides users through connecting required apps securely.
3. **Let DryMerge Handle It:** Once set up, DryMerge takes care of the automation, keeping everything in sync without further input.

**Popular Use Cases:**  
DryMerge boasts a variety of pre-built workflows to streamline processes like managing customer data, coordinating emails and follow-ups, or syncing tasks across platforms.

**Integration Ecosystem:**  
It works with an array of popular tools, including Gmail, Google Sheets, Salesforce, HubSpot, Microsoft Teams, and many more to enhance productivity across various functions—sales, marketing, support, and project management.

**Community Acceptance:**  
DryMerge quickly gained traction, including recognition as "Product of the Day" on Product Hunt, showcasing its potential in the market and among users.

**Resources and Insights:**  
The DryMerge blog offers a wealth of information, from practical guides and innovative automation ideas to strategies for eliminating tedious tasks in workflows.

**Final Thought:**  
DryMerge embodies the spirit of modern automation. By transforming how work is done—removing the barriers often associated with tech—it invites everyone to innovate and enhance their workflow, turning what could be a chore into a seamless experience.

If you're looking to elevate your business processes through straightforward automation, DryMerge is definitely worth exploring.
